body:
Similar situation occurs with the following message: 
```
2017-06-16 20:24:35.483589: F tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.cc:678] Check failed: status.ok() RecvLocalAsync was not ok, key/job:worker/replica:0/task:0/gpu:0;27319926cf0b2d4c;/job:ps/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0;edge_103_report_uninitialized_variables/boolean_mask/Squeeze;0:0;97320812532467277 error message: Step 97320812532467277
```
We are training a VGG16 net using Google's official benchmark script.
